description:
With their first victory, Izayoi has agreed to help Jin win back a former community member.  But when that member attacks in the middle of the night things get off on the wrong foot.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il paraît qu`un type louche et pervers en veut à la lapine Noire ?
It Seems Some Pervert Is After Black Rabbit?
Kuro Usagi ga Eroiyarashii Yatsu ni Nerawareta You Desu yo?
黒ウサギがエロイヤらしい奴に狙われたようですよ?
